channel.title: Irc?
channel.description:
Is it just me that IRC wont work for. It wont work on either my laptop nor my desktop pc.
When ever i try to connect it just says "error timed out etc".
I used to get on to the IRC easily.
Is anyone else having trouble getting on to it?

item.title: Irc?
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I tried and tried…

15:39 *** Connecting to server irc.moparisthebest.com:6667 15:39 !!! Can't connect - timeout! 15:40 *** Connecting to server 204.245.43.12:6667 15:40 !!! Can't connect - timeout! 15:40 *** Connecting to server irc.dairc.us:6667 15:40 *** Ident: invalid host name! 15:40 !!! Can't connect - irc.dairc.us! 15:40 *** Connecting to server irc.pacifica.dairc.us:6667 15:41 !!! Can't connect - timeout! 15:41 *** Connecting to server irc.motoko.dairc.eu:6667 15:41 !!! Can't connect - timeout!

Read full topic

item.title: Irc?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

ThugLife:

Because DaIRC has sucky staff (two or three exceptions) and sucky servers, i say we move back to freenode! at least we could have fun with their staff

Will it no let me connect because of crappy servers? I suck at IRC … I’m usually good at problem solving on computers lol.

I agree, i miss the freenode days.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

ok now i know it is something wrong with the server and not just me being stupid.

I connected successfully to irc.freenode.net.

Mopman I tried connecting to that server and what i get is:

[code]* Connecting to irc.motoko.dairc.eu (6667)

  • Unable to connect to server (Connection timed out)[/code]

=/ i miss the IRC already hehe

Read full topic

item.title: Irc?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You need to connect directly to a server as someone above mentioned, because Dairc staff are so stupid you would not believe.

If you’re in Europe, try /s irc.motoko.dairc.eu, if you’re in the US or whatever that might be a bit laggy.

Read full topic

item.description:

I have the same problem as well irc still doesn’t work for me.

item.title: Irc?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

This happened to me for like two weeks, I tried to ask staffers but since they all think I’m a troll they won’t answer :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2008, 04:00:30 PM[/size][hr]Edit

  • Connect retry #6 irc.moparisthebest.com (6667)
  • Unable to connect to server (Connection timed out)
  • Connect retry #7 irc.moparisthebest.com (6667) (dns pool)

Read full topic
